# Sorrow (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a tear)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC)­, pg. 104

Grief and sadness overcome the subject. She takes a –3 morale penalty on all attack rolls, saving throws, ability checks, and skill checks.
